from EO_ORDER_ITEM EOOI left join EO_ORDER EOOR on EOOR.EOOR_ORDER_NO = EOOI.EOOI_ORDER_NO and EOOR.ORG_ID = EOOI.ORG_ID where EOOI.EOOI_ORDER_NO in (:eoorOrderNos) and EOOI.ORG_ID = :orgId
